Package Grading

Class Programme

java.lang.Object
Grading.Programme
All Implemented Interfaces:
CSVFormat
public class Programme extends Object implements CSVFormat
Represents a programme(course) in the system.

    • Programme

      public Programme(String name, University university, int duration, ProgrammeType level, double cutoffQCA, Department department)
      Creates an instance of programme.
      Parameters:
      name - The programme name.
      university - The university name.
      duration - The duration of the programme.
      level - The level of the programme.
      cutoffQCA - The minimum QCA needed to pass the programme.

    • csvHeader

      public String csvHeader()
      Returns a header for the programme information. This header includes: Name, Duration and Level.
      Specified by:
      csvHeader in interface CSVFormat
      Returns:
      The header as a string.

    • getModules

    • getModule

      public Module getModule(String moduleName)
      Returns the specified module name if the module belongs to a specific course otherwise it returns null.
      Parameters:
      moduleName - The name of the module.
      Returns:
      The specified module name or null.
